recipe.name: Delicious Ham and Potato Soup
recipe.ingredients: 3 1/2 cups potatoes 1/3 cup celery 1/3 cup onion 3/4 cup cooked ham 3 1/4 cups water 2 tablespoons chicken bouillon granules 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon ground pepper 5 tablespoons butter 5 tablespoons all-purpose flour 2 cups milk

directions.step: Combine the potatoes, celery, onion, ham and water in a stockpot. Bring to a boil, then cook over medium heat until potatoes are tender, about 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in the chicken bouillon, salt and pepper.

In a separate saucepan, melt butter over medium-low heat. Whisk in flour with a fork, and cook, stirring constantly until thick, about 1 minute. Slowly stir in milk as not to allow lumps to form until all of the milk has been added. Continue stirring over medium-low heat until thick, 4 to 5 minutes.
Stir the milk mixture into the stockpot, and cook soup until heated through. Serve immediately.
